Name: Madshot: Road to Madness
About the game: The road to madness starts here Play as an alchemist and metaphysician who meddled with dark forces one time too many. Dragged into an infinite abyss of madness and monsters. How will he escape? You are in Control Doge, roll, dash, wall jump, flip, while simultaneously shooting. Madshot: Road to madness offers fluid and responsive movement, youâ€™re always in control of the mayhem. Endless hordes Slaughter, Subdue and control endless hordes of enemies. Get the highest score possible, challenge your friends or climb the online leaderboards. Create lethal combinations There's a big focus on synergies between unlockable weapons, sidearms, upgrades, and ultimate abilities. Discovering the right combinations will be vital.
